title: 'Belgium heading for the largest budget deficit in the Eurozone', European Commission predicts
description:
If policy remains unchanged, the budget deficit for next year will be 5.5 per cent of national output or GDP, the Commission predicts. This makes Belgium the worst performer among Eurozone countries. In 2027, the deficit is expected to rise further to 5.9 per cent.

title: Belgium grinds to a halt in three-day general strike against austerity measures
description:
